thread.section_title: Costa Rican Vacations Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Costa Rican Vacations | www.vacationscostarica.com
thread.title: Sarah Shelley Hampton
thread.title_full: Costa Rican Vacations reviewed by Sarah Shelley Hampton

author: Sarah Shelley Hampton
title: Sarah Shelley Hampton
text: We had a great time on our CR adventure. Traveling with 2 young kids can be nerve racking but going through CRVacations meant that there was nothing to worry about. All our drivers were on time, polite and easy going. Our excursions went off without any issues. The team at CRVacations even helped us when we left an expensive hard drive on the plane when we got there and were able to retrieve it and return it. All in all, I highly recommend using them.
